Text: When can we expect the 350 mb version? I am dying to see this but the discovery channel went all pixilated on me so I couldn't watch.
Dude thanks a lot for this .....was curious to see wha happened to Phill Harris after last week.
As always, much thanks to the uploader from all of us that don't get Discovery channel- any chance someone can upload the 350Mb version as I vob 4episodes at a time to a disc for mates.

Man i really started crying watching this episode. When you see the reaction of the other boats to what happened with Phil espescially Sig and Keith. I think they all got their demons. It's really an eye opener of how ruthless life can be if you dont watch out with how you live your life. 

R.I.P Phil Harris we are alot of people who loved you.
